episodes.title: Meet Richard A. Kiers - Cult Survivor of the Cult  Known as "The Move" - Escaping at Age 15 Alone!
episodes.description:
Richard Tells of the Abuse and  Mind Control he Experienced and Witnessed in this Destructive Cult.  He is an author of the book:  Swindled By Faith:  A Time for Reconciliation and another coming shortly:  Silent Voices.  He has a  New Podcast:  Silent Voices and a Private Facebook Group:  Silent Voices

Richard Kiers:  Facebook Group & Podcast Called:  Silent Voices
His Book: Swindled by Faith:  A Time for Reconciliation  Buy Here on Amazon: https://a.co/d/5FSIMpg

More About Guest: Having Grown Up and Then Escaping an Abusive Cult as a Teenager, known as, “The Move” – Our Guest Today, Richard A. Kiers will share with us just what he has endeavored to overcome as well as share insights that will hopefully encourage those on the same path – from captive slavery to ultimate freedom – mentally, emotionally, spiritually, physically and more.  Richard is the author of the book:  Swindled by Faith:  A Time for Reconciliation  https://a.co/d/5FSIMpg  which details his experience growing up in this cult and sharing the various forms of abuse he experienced and witnessed.  He since has become a prolific writer – enjoying his artistry flare by writing in various genres, autobiography, self-help, children’s books, fiction, non-fiction most of which are upcoming releases (17 books in total).  Currently, Richard is working on his 3rd book called, “Silent Voices” and has recently started his own Private Facebook Group and a Brand New Podcast all with the same name: “Silent Voices” where he helps his members wrap their heads around the tactics used by these cults – like disrupting our critical thinking processes – or freezing our emotional processing to gain and maintain control over members.  So, Richard encourages us to think for ourselves, to make our own decisions, and to get a grasp on how cult leaders think and operate and so much more.

More recently, he has been profiled in the Discovery ID Documentary Episode: “The Movement of God”  (People Magazine Investigates Cults) with another documentary in the making.

Richard currently resides in Edmonton, Alberta, Canada.
